Ability.Name: Execute
Ability.Lua: if incom and AOEMode==0 and thp <= 20 and check(ex) and (not ubid(p,sd)) or (not ubid(p,tfbb)) or pow > 70 then cast(gsi(ex)) end

Ability.Name: Berserker Rage
Ability.Lua: if incom and check(br) and err < 0.5 then cast(gsi(br)) end

Ability.Name: Colossus Smash
Ability.Lua: if incom and check(cs) and csr<=1.0 then cast(gsi(cs)) end

Ability.Name: Heroic Strike
Ability.Lua: t16count = 0 if incom and AOEMode == 0 and check(hs) and ((GlyphCheck(4339) and pow > 115) or pow > 85) or (csr > 0 and pow > 40 and t16count > 2) then cast(gsi(hs)) end

Ability.Name: Battle Shout
Ability.Lua: if incom and check(bs) then if AOEMode==0 then cast(gsi(bs),nil) end if AOEMode==1 and pow < 70 then cast(gsi(bs),nil) end end

Ability.Name: Whirlwind
Ability.Lua: if incom and AOEMode==1 and check(ww) and pow>=30 and sir(gsi(ms),t)==1 then cast(gsi(ww)) end

Ability.Name: Cleave
Ability.Lua: if incom and check(clv) and sir(gsi(ms),t)==1 and pow > 110 then cast(gsi(clv)) end

Ability.Name: Mortal Strike
Ability.Lua: if incom and check(ms) then cast(gsi(ms)) end

Ability.Name: Overpower
Ability.Lua: if incom and AOEMode==0 and check(op) and pow>=10 and thp>=20 or ubid(p,sd) then cast(gsi(op)) end

Ability.Name: Slam
Ability.Lua: if incom and check(sl) and pow>=25 --and (pow>=(powmax-30) or pow>=40) then if AOEMode==0 and (csr > 0 and tfbc < 3) and thp>=20 then cast(gsi(sl)) end if AOEMode==1 and (csr > 0 or ubid(p,sw)) then cast(gsi(sl)) end end

Ability.Name: Thunderclap
Ability.Lua: if incom and AOEMode~=0 and check(tc) and pow>=20 and wbr<=15 and sir(gsi(ms),t)==1 then cast(gsi(tc)) end

Ability.Name: Sweeping Strikes
Ability.Lua: if incom and AOEMode==1 and pow>=30 and check(sw) and sir(gsi(ms),t)==1 then cast(gsi(sw)) end

Ability.Name: Initial
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_ImoCuteOne.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put PQR_ImoCuteOne.lua in the data folder.", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end end
shcom() timecheck() --Dummy 5min DPS Test if UnitExists("target") then if cTime >= 300 and dummy() then StopAttack() ClearTarget() print("5 Minute Dummy Test Concluded - Profile Stopped") --PQR_StopRotation() end end
------ABILITIES------- av = 107574 --Avatar bs = 6673 --Battle Shout btls = 2457 --Battle Stance br = 18499 --Berserker Rage bers = 2458 --Berserker Stance bb = 12292 --Bloodbath bls = 46924 --Bladestorm chrg = 100 --Charge clv = 845 --Cleave cs = 86346 --Colossus Smash cmds = 469 --Commanding Shout dc = 85730 --Deadly Calm defs = 71 --Defensive Stance dm = 114203 --Demoralizing Banner dbts = 118038 --Die by the Sword darm = 676 --Disarm ds = 102060 --Disrupting Shout dr = 118000 --Dragon Roar er = 55694 --Enraged Regeneration ex = 5308 --Execute ham = 1715 --Hamstring hl = 6544 --Heroic Leap hs = 78 --Heroic Strike ht = 57755 --Heroic Throw iv = 3411 --Intervene is = 5246 --Intimidating Shout imp = 103840 --Impending Victory mb = 114192 --Mocking Banner msr = 114028 --Mass Spell Reflection ms = 12294 --Mortal Strike op = 7384 --Overpower pm = 6552 --Pummel rc = 97462 --Rallying Cry rk = 1719 --Recklessness st = 64382 --Shattering Throw sb = 114207 --Skull Banner sbt = 107570 --Storm Bolt shk = 46968 --Shockwave shw = 871 --Shield Wall sl = 1464 --Slam sr = 23920 --Spell Reflection sa = 7386 --Sunder Armor sw = 12328 --Sweeping Strikes tnt = 355 --Taunt tc = 6343 --Thunder Clap vr = 34428 --Victory Rush ww = 1680 --Whirlwind
------Racials------ blf = 20572 --Blood Fury (Orc)
------Passives/Buffs/Debuffs------ dw = 115768 --Deep Wounds erg = 13046 --Enrage sd = 29725 --Sudden Death tfb = 56638 --Taste for Blood tfbb = 60503 --Taste for Blood Buff wb = 115798 --Weakend Blows
-----Tracking------ stance = GetShapeshiftForm() if udbid(t,wb,p) then wbr = (select(7, udbid(t,wb,p)) - GetTime()) else wbr = 0 end if smashed==nil then smashed = 0 end if udbid(t,cs,p) then smashed = 1 csr = (select(7, udbid(t,cs,p)) - GetTime()) else smashed = 0 csr = 0 end if ubid(p,erg) then err = (select(7, ubid(p,erg)) - GetTime()) else err = 0 end if select(4,ubid(p,tfbb)) == nil then tfbc = 0 else tfbc = select(4,ubid(p,tfbb)) end if GlyphCheck(58357)==true then gag = true else gag = false end if gcd==nil then gcd = 0 end gcdcheck = GetTime() > 0
-- CD Switch if PQ_CDMode==nil then PQ_CDMode = "Boss" end if IsRightControlKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - PQ_CDTimer > 1 then PQ_CDTimer = GetTime()
if not PQ_CD then PQ_CD = CD_BossOnly PQ_CDMode = "Boss" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff79BAECBoss Only|cffffffff", "Notice") elseif PQ_CD == CD_BossOnly then PQ_CD = CD_Auto PQ_CDMode = "On" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff006400On|cffffffff", "Notice") else PQ_CD = false PQ_CDMode = "Off" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cffDC143COff|cffffffff", "Notice") end end
-- AoE/Single Switch if AOEMode == nil then AOEMode = 0 end if PQ_Rot == nil then PQ_Rot = "Single" end
if IsRightShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - PQ_AOETimer > 0.25 then PQ_AOETimer = GetTime()
if PQ_AOE then PQ_AOE = false AOEMode = 0 PQ_Rot = "Single" -- PQR_SwapRotation("Arms Single (CuteOne)") PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cffDC143CSingle|cffffffff", "Notice") elseif AOEMode==0 then -- PQ_AOE = false AOEMode = 1 -- PQ_Rot = "Hybrid" -- PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cff79BAECHybrid|cffffffff", "Notice") --elseif AOEMode==1 then PQ_AOE = true -- AOEMode = 2 PQ_Rot = "Multi" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cff006400Multi|cffffffff", "Notice") -- PQR_SwapRotation("Arms AOE (CuteOne)") end end PQR_Event("PQR_Text",'CD-Mode: '..PQ_CDMode..' --- '..'AOE-Mode: '..PQ_Rot)
ttd("target")
--if plvl < 10 then -- if plvl >=3 and hastar and cd(chrg)==0 and sir(gsi(chrg),t)==1 then -- cast(gsi(chrg)) -- end -- if pow>=30 and hastar then -- cast(gsi(hs)) -- end --end

Ability.Name: Heroic Throw
Ability.Lua: if plvl > 10 then if incom and AOEMode==0 and check(ht) then cast(gsi(ht)) end end

Ability.Name: Charge
Ability.Lua: if hastar and check(chrg) and sir(gsi(ms),t)~=1 and IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus()==nil then cast(gsi(chrg)) end

Ability.Name: Interrupts
Ability.Lua:
--if check(pm) and Interruptable(t,pm) then -- cast(gsi(pm),t) --elseif check(ds) and cd(pm)~=0 and Interruptable(t,ds) then -- cast(gsi(ds),t) --end --if incom and check(sh) then -- cast(gsi(sh)) --end
local castingTarget = nil local custTars = {"target","focus"} for i=1, #custTars do if ( select(9,UnitCastingInfo(custTars[i]))==false or select(8,UnitChannelInfo(custTars[i]))==false ) then castingTarget = custTars[i] end end
if castingTarget ~= nil and ubid(p,sr) == nil then local castName = UnitCastingInfo(castingTarget) local channelName = UnitChannelInfo(castingTarget) local castName = channelName --Pum-- if select(2,cd(pm)) == 0 and sir(gsi(pm),castingTarget) == 1 and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(castName) ~= nil or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ~= nil ) then cast(gsi(pm),castingTarget) PQR_DelayRotation(.5) end --DS-- if ( select(2,cd(pm)) ~= 0 or sir(gsi(pm),castingTarget) == 0) and select(2,cd(ds)) == 0 and CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) ~= nil and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(castName) ~= nil or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ~= nil ) then cast(gsi(ds)) PQR_DelayRotation(.5) end --HT-- if gag == true and ( select(2,cd(pm)) ~= 0 or sir(gsi(pm),castingTarget) == 0) and ( select(2,cd(ds)) ~= 0 or CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) == nil) and select(2,cd(ht)) == 0 and sir(gsi(ht),castingTarget) == 1 and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(castName) ~= nil or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ~= nil ) then cast(gsi(ht),castingTarget) end --SB-- if ( select(2,cd(pm)) ~= 0 or sir(gsi(pm),castingTarget) == 0) and ( select(2,cd(ds)) ~= 0 or CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) == nil) and select(2,cd(ht)) ~= 0 and select(2,cd(sbt)) == 0 and sir(gsi(ht),castingTarget) == 1 and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(castName) ~= nil or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ~= nil ) then cast(gsi(sbt),castingTarget) end --SR-- if ( select(2,cd(pm)) ~= 0 or sir(gsi(pm),castingTarget) == 0) and ( select(2,cd(ds)) ~= 0 or CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) == nil) and select(2,cd(ht)) ~= 0 and select(2,cd(sbt)) ~= 0 and select(2,cd(sr)) == 0 --and sir(gsi(pm),castingTarget) == 1 and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(castName) ~= nil or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ~= nil ) then cast(gsi(sr),castingTarget) end end

Ability.Name: Recklessness
Ability.Lua: if incom and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) and check(rk) and sir(gsi(ms),t)==1 --and (((ubid(p,bb) or (csr>=5 or cd(cs)<=2)) and (thp<=20 or ttd(t)>=186)) or ttd(t)<=13) --and (ttd(t)<=18 or ((ttd(t)>=186 or (thp < 20 and (csr>=5 or csr<=1.5))) and ((not TalentCheck(bb)) or cd(bb)==0))) and ((not TalentCheck(bb) and ((cd(cs) < 2 or csr>=5) and (ttd(t) > 192 or thp < 20))) or (ubid(p,bb) and (ttd(t) > 192 or thp < 20)) or ttd(t)<=12) then cast(gsi(rk)) end

Ability.Name: Skull Banner
Ability.Lua: if incom and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) and check(sb) and sir(gsi(ms),t)==1 and (not ubid(p,sb)) and (((cd(cs) < 2 or csr>=5) and ttd(t) > 192) or ubid(p,rk)) then cast(gsi(sb)) end

Ability.Name: Tier 6
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=90 and incom and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then -- Avatar if check(av) and sir(gsi(ms),t)==1 and (ubid(p,rk) or ttd(t)<=25) then cast(gsi(av)) end -- Bloodbath if check(bb) and sir(gsi(ms),t)==1 and (csr > 0 or cd(cs) < 4) --and (ttd(t)<=18 or ubid(p,rk) or ttd(t)>=75) --and (((csr>=5 or cd(cs)<=2) and (thp<=20 or ttd(t)>=69)) or ttd(t)<=19) then cast(gsi(bb)) end -- Storm Bolt if check(sbt) and csr > 0 then cast(gsi(sbt)) end end

Ability.Name: Pause
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or SpellIsTargeting() or not UnitExists("Target") or UnitBuffID("Player",80169) or UnitBuffID("Player",87959) or UnitChannelInfo("Player") or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("Player") or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("Target") or not UnitAffectingCombat("Player") --or plvl < 10 then return true end

Ability.Name: Defensive
Ability.Lua: if php<=80 and check(vr) then cast(gsi(vr)) end if php<=80 and check(imp) then cast(gsi(imp)) end if php<=50 and ubid(p,erg) and check(er) then cast(gsi(er)) end if php <= 30 and sir(gsi(ms),t)~=1 then if stance ~= 71 then cast(gsi(71)) elseif stance ~= 2457 and sir(gsi(ms),t)==1 then cast(gsi(2457)) end end if php < 30 and GetItemCount(5512,false,false) > 0 and ( select(2, GetItemCooldown(5512)) == 0 ) then UseItemByName(5512) end if php<=25 and check(shw) then cast(gsi(shw)) end if php<=25 and check(dbts) then cast(gsi(dbts)) end if php<=25 and CanHealPot() then UseItemByName(drinkme) end if php<=15 and check(rc) then cast(gsi(rc)) end

Ability.Name: Hamstring
Ability.Lua: if plvl >= 36 then if PQR_CheckUIError(SPELL_FAILED_IMMUNE)==true then if UnitExists(t) then hamtar = UnitGUID(t) hamstr = false end end if outcom or UnitExists(t) then if outcom or UnitGUID(t)~=hamtar then hamstr = true end end if incom and check(ham) and not udbid(t,ham,p) and not SpecialUnit() and hamstr then cast(gsi(ham)) end end

Ability.Name: Heroic Leap
Ability.Lua: --if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() then -- SpellStopCasting() --end if --(outcom or (incom and csr > 0)) cd(hl)==0 and IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus()==nil then cast(gsi(hl)) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end end

Ability.Name: Impending Victory
Ability.Lua: if incom and pow>=10 and check(imp) and thp>=20 then cast(gsi(imp)) end

Ability.Name: Racials
Ability.Lua: if incom and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) and check(blf) and sir(gsi(ms),t)==1 and (((csr>=5 or cd(cs)<=2) and (thp<=20 or ttd(t)>=69)) or ttd(t)<=19) then cast(gsi(blf)) end

Ability.Name: Tier 4
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=60 and incom and sir(gsi(ms),t) == 1 then -- Dragon Roar if check(dr) then if AOEMode==0 and csr == 0 then cast(gsi(dr)) end if AOEMode==1 and ubid(p,bb) then cast(gsi(dr)) end end -- Shockwave if check(shk) then cast(gsi(shk)) end -- BladeStorm if AOEMode==1 and ubid(p,bb) and check(bls) then cast(gsi(bls)) end end

Ability.Name: Offensive
Ability.Lua: --Synapse Springs if incom and GetInventoryItemCooldown(p,10) == 0 and ubid(p,bb) then UseInventoryItem(10) end --Mogu Power Potion if incom and GetItemCount(76095,false,false) > 0 and ( select(2, GetItemCooldown(76095)) == 0 ) and ((thp<20 and ubid(p,rk)) or HaveBuff(p,{90355,80353,2825,32182}) or ttd(t)<=25) then UseItemByName(76095) end
